channel.title: Change exp amount needed for "X" Level
channel.description:
Hi im sorta new to this and i have noticed in my server you need like 1million XP from 76 to like 77 and i dont like it how do i change the amount needed (NOT AMOUNT GAINED PER HIT)
please help
